info.description:
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams in the development and rigorous testing of innovative features for the blood transfusion tracking interhospital system.
- Ensured the high quality, performance, and reliability of the system through comprehensive testing and proactive bug resolution.

- Orchestrated the successful launch of a private school for children, leading a team of educators.
- Strategically assigned classes and extracurricular activities while closely monitoring and reporting on progress.

- Leveraged My-SQL expertise to develop, optimize, and implement functions, stored processes, and scripts, contributing to the creation of internal systems and regular updates.
- Spearheaded data warehousing efforts, designing and maintaining databases for prominent European clients including Nissan, Opel, Skoda, Audi, and Volkswagen.
- Generated comprehensive CSV and Excel reports by executing database queries, providing vital insights to support informed decision-making.
- Championed process automation initiatives, utilizing PowerShell and Batch scripting to streamline monthly updates of internal systems.

info.company: National Research University — Higher School of Economics
info.description: Facilitated the learning process by creating tailored homework assignments and conducting consultations for students in ‘Mathematical Analysis’ and ‘Introduction to Computer Science’.

Crafted robust test algorithms for ATM and POS-terminals, ensuring the integration of new features into credit card payment systems
Conducted rigorous testing to guarantee the stability and functionality of payment systems.

info.company: Ministry of Digital Development, Communications and Mass Media
